JushBJJ /

      Mr.-Ranedeer-AI-Tutor---A GPT-4 AI Tutor Prompt for customizable personalized learning experiences.

FlowiseAI /

      Flowise---Drag & drop UI to build your customized LLM flow using LangchainJS

mlc-ai /

      mlc-llm---Enable everyone to develop, optimize and deploy AI models natively on everyone's devices.

Ryujinx /

      Ryujinx---Experimental Nintendo Switch Emulator written in C#

datawhalechina /

      prompt-engineering-for-developers---吴恩达《ChatGPT Prompt Engineering for Developers》课程中文版

calcom /

      cal.com---Scheduling infrastructure for absolutely everyone.

openai /

      openai-cookbook---Examples and guides for using the OpenAI API

Z4ee /

      StarRail-S-GC---This repository provides code for a simple cheat for the game Honkai Star Rail. For informational purposes only. Use at your own risk.

1rgs /

      jsonformer---A Bulletproof Way to Generate Structured JSON from Language Models

cirediatpl /

      FigmaChain---FigmaChain is a set of Python scripts that generate HTML/CSS code based on Figma designs. Using OpenAI's GPT-3 model, FigmaChain enables developers to quickly generate HTML/CSS code from a Figma design input. It also includes a Streamlit-based chatbot interface for interactive code generation.

gventuri /

      pandas-ai---Pandas AI is a Python library that integrates generative artificial intelligence capabilities into Pandas, making dataframes conversational

MystenLabs /

      sui---Sui, a next-generation smart contract platform with high throughput, low latency, and an asset-oriented programming model powered by the Move programming language

jconorgrogan /

      JamesGPT---Jailbreak for ChatGPT: Predict the future, opine on politics and controversial topics, and assess what is true. May help us understand more about LLM Bias

vuetifyjs /

      vuetify---🐉 Vue Component Framework

mishalhossin /

      Discord-Chatbot-Gpt4Free---This is a Python-based Discord Chatbot. This is all free due to the GPT4FREE project

Azure-Samples /

      azure-search-openai-demo---A sample app for the Retrieval-Augmented Generation pattern running in Azure, using Azure Cognitive Search for retrieval and Azure OpenAI large language models to power ChatGPT-style and Q&A experiences.

Arize-ai /

      phoenix---ML Observability in a Notebook - Uncover Insights, Surface Problems, Monitor, and Fine Tune your Generative LLM, CV and Tabular Models

donnemartin /

      system-design-primer---Learn how to design large-scale systems. Prep for the system design interview. Includes Anki flashcards.

shadcn /

      taxonomy---An open source application built using the new router, server components and everything new in Next.js 13.

ethereum-lists /

      chains---provides metadata for networkIDs and chainIDs

microsoft /

      TypeScript---TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that compiles to clean JavaScript output.

KurtBestor /

      Hitomi-Downloader---🍰 Desktop utility to download images/videos/music/text from various websites, and more.

irgolic /

      AutoPR---Fix issues with AI-generated pull requests, powered by ChatGPT

okisdev /

      ChatChat---Chat Chat, unlock your next level AI conversation experience. Deploy your own AI Interface, all AI in one place.

Significant-Gravitas /

      Auto-GPT-Plugins---Plugins for Auto-GPT
